name: The Pets 2 - Adventure Game
description:
The pets a new pet free game, you will be playing as a pug, grumpy or a pig to get revenge and beat the zombies.
the game is exciting and fun. you will be able to use multiple powers of your pet and upgrade they abilities.

FEATURE

Beautiful graphics
Different pets to choose from
Different weapons
+17 unique levels
a variety of enemies and monsters

How to play

just follow the simple tutorial in the first scene of the game.

Download The Pets Now and let the adventure begin!
